item.title: Meteor: a better way to use meteor npm command
item.description: Did you forget to add meteor command before npm? Try adding a bash script that will make sure you always run it correctly.

item.title: Commitlint: custom commit message with emojis
item.description: A guide to customize the commitlint to your need and use it as convention in your git repository. Customize commitlint header format to use emojis.
item.content:encoded: A guide to customize the commitlint to your need and use it as convention in your git repository. Customize commitlint header format to use emojis.
item.author: str.dr460@gmail.com (Dragos Strainu)

item.title: 9 Ways to Win a Hackathon... Without Coming in First Place
item.description: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.
item.content:encoded: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.
item.author: str.dr460@gmail.com (Dragos Strainu)
